title: Slipstream
excerpt: This paper introduces Slipstream, an Ebb-and-Flow DAG-based BFT protocol, that allows for fast UTXO transaction confirmation.
citation: Nikita Polyanskii. (2024). "Slipstream: Dynamically Available Consensus on a DAG with Fast Confirmation for UTXO Transactions".
